text: Mathias Florén (born 11 August 1976 in Söderhamn) is a Swedish former professional footballer who played as a left back. During his career, he represented Alnö IF, GIF Sundsvall, IFK Norrköping, FC Groningen, IF Elfsborg, and IF Sylvia. In 2001, he won two caps for the Sweden national football team. ==References== * == External links == * Mathias Florén blir U19-tränare i IFK Norrköping * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:People from Söderhamn Category:Swedish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Sweden international footballers Category:Alnö IF players Category:GIF Sundsvall players Category:IFK Norrköping players Category:Swedish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands Category:FC Groningen players Category:Swedish expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:IF Elfsborg players Category:Eredivisie players Category:IF Sylvia players Category:Allsvenskan players
title: Mathias Florén
